body.name: FLEXISPOT Adjustable Height Desk 40 x 24 Inches Whole Piece Standing Desk for Small Space Electric Sit Stand Home Office Table Computer Workstation (White Frame + Maple Desktop)
features: SLEEK & FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: Streamlined 40” x 24” eco-friendly whole-piece desktop easily holds your laptop, monitor, and more while taking up minimal floor space in your home or office. Please allow a slight 0 to 1-inch difference in desktop size due to manual measurement.
ELECTRIC HEIGHT ADJUSTABLE LIFT SYSTEM: The motor lift mechanism offers smoother height adjustments, from 28.6" to 46.3", at a speed of 0.6"/second with low noise(under 50 dB) while running.
SOLID CONSTRUCTION: An industrial-grade steel frame combined with a solid desktop allows for a 132 lbs weight capacity to support your ideal workspace setup.

BUILT FOR WORK FROM HOME: The perfect standing desk to allow independent and remote workers to stay active, healthy, and productive while working from home. Precisely adjust your desk to your height and insert healthy movement into your day.

PLEASE NOTE: This product is also covered by a 5-year warranty for the frame, motor and other mechanisms, and a 2-year warranty for the controller and switch, electronics. Some steps may require a drill, which is not included.

Is the top a single piece or two (split) pieces? Our standing desk features a whole-piece desktop that provides a completely smooth surface, is easy to clean, and eliminates bumps and noise caused by gaps while increasing the stability of the whole table. Does this product come with assembly tools? We include all the hardware you need right in the box. Certain installation steps may be easier to complete with an electric screwdriver, which is not included. How durable are FlexiSpot standing desks? Our desks are built to last, and we have the durability tests to prove it. During product testing, we raise and lower our desks more than 20,000 times—with zero sign of breakdown. If you any problems, please contact FLEXISPOT. What is the height range? The height of the desk can be adjusted from 28.6" to 46.3" (0.6" thickness of table top not included) at a speed of 0.6"/second with low noise (under 50 dB) while running.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elevate Your Productivity with FLEXISPOT Electric Standing Desk!
reviews.reviewText: The FLEXISPOT Electric Black Standing Desk is a game-changer for anyone seeking a versatile and ergonomic workspace. This desk boasts an impressive 55 x 28 inch whole-piece desktop that offers ample room for all your work essentials, allowing you to spread out and work comfortably.The adjustable height feature is a standout attribute, enabling you to effortlessly switch between sitting and standing positions. This promotes better posture, reduces fatigue, and boosts productivity during long working hours.Assembly is a breeze with the desk arriving in two packages, and the clear instructions make the process seamless. The white frame adds a touch of elegance, while the black top complements any home office decor.One of the desk's most remarkable features is its whisper-quiet electric motor, ensuring smooth and noiseless height adjustments, making it suitable for any office environment or shared workspace.The solid construction and high-quality materials ensure durability and stability, providing a reliable and long-lasting investment for your work or study space.What sets the FLEXISPOT Electric Standing Desk apart is the exceptional customer service and warranty offered by FLEXISPOT. Their dedication to customer satisfaction is evident, and it provides peace of mind knowing that your purchase is backed by reliable support.In conclusion, the FLEXISPOT Electric Black Standing Desk is a top-notch, versatile workstation that surpasses expectations. Its spacious desktop, effortless height adjustment, and sturdy construction make it an ideal choice for a healthier and more productive work environment. If you're looking to upgrade your home office setup, this desk is a fantastic investment that will undoubtedly elevate your workspace and enhance your overall well-being.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great stand-up desk. Easy, sturdy, solid
reviews.reviewText: This desk is a very good value. I've been using one for work for about 9 months. Up and down a couple times per day. I like it so much we bought another to replace a cheaper desk for my HS junior. I'd love to see if anyone could do better than this desk at this price point.Pros:+ Very sturdy, even at highest setting+ Quiet movement--I've adjusted during conference calls with no disruption to the call+ One solid piece desktop--no seams+ Size: I have the 55" X 28" I have two 24" monitors and my laptop as third display. Plenty of room for all of those side by side, an ergonomic keyboard, a lamp, two bookshelf speakers, a label printer and plenty of work space still.+Size, Part Deux: I have a 20" wide portable set of drawers I put under it. Fits great, plenty of room for my legs under it in the down/seated position.+ Slightly beveled edge--doesn't dig into wrists with sharp edge+ Easy to assemble. I don't know how one reviewer said it took him 2 days and 2 adults. The first one took me a 90 minutes, by myself. Second one about 45 minutes by myself.Cons: (really minimal, and petty)- Instructions were a little challenging at first, especially the connecting rod (one motor, turns a rod that connects to both legs so both legs adjust with gears) and the cross brace. Once you figure out that the hardware (legs/braces/motor) kit is designed to work with desktops of multiple widths, and that you just extend the connecting rod and cross brace to the width of this desk, it's easy.- No pre-drilled second hole for the control panel. You screw in the front into a pre-drilled hole, but then have to drill your own pilot for the second screw. If you don't put the second screw in, the controller will spin. Took 9 seconds to drill the hole + 90 seconds to get drill and bit from garage.- Surface had an ever so slight texture (while laminated version). No problems for me when writing--I don't even notice. If I was doing very precise drawing/drafting work, it might need a smooth topper.Buy it. Stop reading reviews or researching. This is the one. And I am not receiving any kind of incentive for this review. I am likely to get a third one for our youngest son.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy! Large single surface
reviews.reviewText: I bought this desk to be able to work at home ( and use my walking pad while working). So far, I'm loving it! The desk is very sturdy. I really like that the surface is large and one solid piece. I didn't want gaps on my work surface. The electric mechanism to raise and lower the table works perfectly and is super quiet. The instructions aren't bad, but you do have to really look at the pictures to be sure you're putting things in the right places. I am a 56 year old female, and I was able to put this together by myself. I'd guess it took 1, maybe 2 hours to complete.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, thick, whole piece board can assemble by a woman
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Overall product is good as expected and value for money. Mine is 48x 30 inches with casters. One desk came in 2 shipments (one for the top another one for the frame) without sharing separate tracking number so I just connected to customer service to reconfirm. As I ordered casters, so 3 packages in total for me. Instruction menu provided in both handbook and qr code to view vdo insturction. However, the instruction should be revised to be more precise a bit such as how long you should extend the cord before connect to the board. Also, the holes for button pad at the board are not 100% matching the instruction and not matching 2 holes in vertical side of the pad so I drilled only one as provided. I tried drilling another hole without pre-drill hole from the manufacturer but it did not work.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5/5 - A budget option with no compromise
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful, sturdy, spacious - An outstanding standing desk for a fraction of the cost of premium options. I've used a small handful of standing desks, including a Herman Miller from my office, and I can confidently say this is a great option for an equivalent for the home.Assembling the desk required a bit of work, particularly as the leg and base is astonishingly heavy, however, I managed in just around two and a half hours. There are videos online which are super helpful, but aside from the weight of the materials, the assembly is no more difficult than a typical IKEA furniture.Super sturdy and stable, not much more to ask for. I feel as though this is the best bang for your buck standing desk out there. Super happy.Side note: I did not notice any unevenness, I suspect the couple of reviews that state this is because they accidentally turned on of the transmission rod when it was inserted on to only one of the legs during assembly--I for sure did. To remedy this, simply turn the transmission rod counter clockwise for both legs (to achieve the shortest maximum length) then re-insert the rod.

reviews.reviewTitle: Saving my health one stand at a time

reviews.reviewText: i really love it and service really good but there have a bit flaw under top desk.

reviews.reviewTitle: I do not recommend the product.
reviews.reviewText: The product is highly unstable, making it difficult to use. The measures are also incorrect, which can lead to inaccurate results. Additionally, the product cannot be changed or modified to suit specific needs, further limiting its usefulness. Overall, I would strongly advise against purchasing this product as it is not cost-effective and may cause more frustration than it's worth.

reviews.reviewTitle: Relatively easy install, does the job
reviews.reviewText: This was relatively easy to put together, and having 2 people is probably necessary in terms of holding things up etc. Desk looks great. I received maple top instead of the white as ordered but was offered the choice of either a small refund for incorrect top of returning/getting new one. Opted for refund just because it's easier and quicker. Maple top still looks lovely and the size is perfect for an at-home office. If you're not elevating your monitor/laptop with arms then you probably would want a bigger size than my 120x60 but for me, without those on the desktop taking up space, it's perfect. Can recommend :)
